text: Na yānagatassa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā
edit: Na yānagatassa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā

translations.transtext: 63. I will not teach Dhamma to a person in a vehicle who is not ill: a training to be observed.
๖๓. พึงทำศึกษาว่า “เราจักไม่แสดงธรรมแก่บุคคลไม่ใช่ผู้เจ็บไข้ไปในยาน”
63. I shall not teach Dhamma to one in a vehicle who is not sick: this is a training to be done.
